text:
Rain in seattle.
Don't forget an umbrella,
or you will be glum.

My tunes are the jam.
I like to remix them all.
Have you heard this one?

Snow is still falling.
We went fast down the mountain.
Let's do one more run!

Beep boop bop beep boop,
I am robot octocat.
Let us catch a bug!

Same plot as before,
so why is it still awesome?
It must be the hat.
